testsuite.name: Dashboard Amazon
testsuite.details: This test suite contains test cases related to Amazon as platform on Dashboard.

testcase.name: Create an Amazon Publisher App
testcase.summary: This test case is to check the creation of Amazon Publisher Application.
testcase.preconditions: 1.User should Login with Vungle domain or Publisher and should have a valid user#id and password

step.actions: Login into the dashboard as a Vungle Admin (with a @vungle.com domain)
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page of the Dashboard

step.actions: In the hamburger, click on the publisher option of the toggle
step.expectedresults: User should be onthe Management Page with Applications and Placements Tab

step.actions: Click on "Add new Application" tab
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Application Page

step.actions:
On Create Application Page, enter the required information

  • Select the Amazon Platform 
  • Enter the Application Name
  • Check the check box od My app is live on the Appstore
  • Enter the Appstore URL
  • Select the Category from the drop list
  • In the Application targeting section, select the App-tags and Tag base filtering
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit button
step.expectedresults: Publisher Application should be created and user should be directed to the details page of the Publisher Application.

testcase.name: Modify Amazon Publisher Application and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify any field of the Amazon Publisher Application, submit and verify
testcase.preconditions: Amazon Publisher Application should be created

step.actions: Login to the Application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Click on Global search and enter the Application ID of the Amazon Publisher Application
step.expectedresults: Application name with details and edit icon should be displayed

step.actions: Click on edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should land on update application page

step.actions: Modify the Category of the application
step.expectedresults: Modified Category should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Application should be saved and user should be diredted to the details page with modified  category information

testcase.name: Verify SDK Page
testcase.summary: Verify SDK Page for Amazon Updates

testcase.name: Verify Amazon App Logo in table view
testcase.summary: Verify the Amazon App Logo in the table view
testcase.preconditions: Should have an Amazon Publisher App

step.actions: Login to the application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Publisher Managemnet Page

step.actions: On the Publisher Management Page, look for the Amazon Publisher Application created by entering the name in the Application column funnel.
step.expectedresults: Amazon Publisher Application should show up with Platform, Date modified, views, completes, revenue, eCPM and edit and details icon

step.actions: Verify the Amazon Logo  is present in the Platform column of the table view
step.expectedresults: Amazon icon should present in the platform column

step.actions: Verify the Amazon Logo on the table view of the advertisement side, by clicking on Advertiser on Hamburger icon and then navigating to Applications page by clicking Applications tab on the Advertiser.
step.expectedresults: The table list of the Applications should have the Amazon Logo in the platform column of the applications

testcase.name: Verify Amazon Appstore Icon
testcase.summary: Verify Amazon Appstore Icon Support (various pages)

testcase.name: Create an Amazon Advertiser App
testcase.summary: Create an Amazon Advertiser Application and verify
testcase.preconditions: Login to the application with valid credentials and Login user should be Admin user

step.actions: Login into the dashboard as a Vungle Admin (with a @vungle.com domain)
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management Page

step.actions: In the hamburger, click on the Advertiser option of the toggle
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Advertiser side with Campaigns, Applications and Creatives tabs.

step.actions: Click on Applicatons tab and then "Add New Application"
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Create Application page

step.actions:
Enter the required information

  • Select the Amazon Platform
  • Enter the name of teh Application
  • Select the Category from the available list
  • Select the values for App targeting
step.expectedresults: Entered values should be displayed

step.actions: Enter Submit button
step.expectedresults:
Advertiser Application should be created and user should be on the details page of the Advertiser App with the following info

  • Application Name
  • Vungle Application ID
  • Platform
  • Appstore URL
  • Type
  • Orientation
  • Logging
  • Advertiser setings
  • Ad App targeing and edit icon

testcase.name: Update Amazon Advertiser Application
testcase.summary: Update Amazon Advertiser Application and Verify

step.actions: Login to the application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and enter the Application ID of the Advertiser Application created in the VDBA-6 and click enter
step.expectedresults: Amazon Advertiser Application created should be displayed with edit and details icon and also Logo

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Update Application page

step.actions: Navigate to the Category field and change the value by scrolling throughthe drop list
step.expectedresults: Selected value should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Advertiser Application should be saved and the user should be on the details page with the modified value of the Category.

testcase.name: Create a Vungle ads Campaign for Amazon Application
testcase.summary: Create a Vungle ads Campaign for Amazon Application and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have an Advertiser Application  and Login user should be Admin user

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard Application and click on the Advertiser option of the toggle
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Advertiser page

step.actions: Click on Add New Campaign tab and then Select Campaign manually in the Campaign selection pop up
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Campaign page

step.actions:
Enter the following information

  • Name
  • Choose the Amazon Advertiser Application created in VDBA-6
  • End Time
  • Total Budget
  • OS Version Limit
  • SDK Version Limit
  • Select the countries from the list available
  • Enter the TPAT Event and the URL
  • Check the MOAT Check box
step.expectedresults:
• Entered information should be displayed
  • The Application should have Amazon Logo next to the Application field
  • Device Type selection should not be present

TPAT URL:https://pixel.mtrcs.samba.tv/v2/vtr/vtrcertification/vtrcertification/vungle/impression?c={{{timestamp}}}&sa_deviceid={{{device_id}}}&sa_cr={{{creative}}}&sa_pl={{{vungle_id}}}&sa_li={{{eid}}}

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be created and user should be directed to the details page of the Campaign with Status(Active/Inactive) and Clone the Campaign link and all the entered data.

testcase.name: Edit Vungle ads Campaign
testcase.summary: Edit Vungle ads Campaign and Verify on the details page
testcase.preconditions: Dashboard Should have a Vungle ads Campaign for Amazon App

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard Application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management Page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and enter the Campaign name created in the testcase VDBA-8
step.expectedresults: Campaign name with edit and details icon should be dispalyed

step.actions:
Modify the Campaign by 

  • Checking the Auto Pacing checkbox checked and enter the Pacing Overage percentage as 25
  • Change the geo location from CountryTargeting to City Targetingradio button and select the cities from the list available
  • Uncheck the MOAT Campaign
step.expectedresults:
• Auto Pacing checkbox should be checked and entered percentage should be displayed
  • City Targeting Radio button should be selected and entered cities should be displayed
  • MOAT Checkbox should be unchecked

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be saved and user should be on the details page and all the modifed values should be displayed

testcase.name: Create an Exchange Campaign for Amazon App
testcase.summary: Create an Exchange Campaign for Amazon App and verify
testcase.preconditions: Dashboard should have an Amazon Advertiser App

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard Application and click on the Advertiser option of the toggle
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Advertiser page

step.actions: Click on Add New Campaign tab and then Select Campaign manually in the Campaign selection pop up

Enter the following information

  •  Name
  • Choose the Amazon Advertiser Application created in VDBA-6
  • Select the Campaign TYpe as Exchange
  • End Time
  •  Total Budget
  • OS Version Limit
  •  SDK Version Limit
  • Select the Optimization Type as Dynamic and enter the values for Default Bid/Target Bid and Horizon
  •  Select the countries from the list available
  • Enter the TPAT Event and the URL
step.expectedresults:
Entered information should be displayed

TPAT URL:https://pixel.mtrcs.samba.tv/v2/vtr/vtrcertification/vtrcertification/vungle/impression?c={{{timestamp}}}&sa_deviceid={{{device_id}}}&sa_cr={{{creative}}}&sa_pl={{{vungle_id}}}&sa_li={{{eid}}}

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be created and user should be directed to the details page of the Campaign with Status(Active/Inactive) and Clone the Campaign link and all the entered data.

testcase.name: Update Exchange Campaign
testcase.summary: Update Exchange Campaign and verify
testcase.preconditions: Dashboard should have an Amazon Advertiser App

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard Application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management Page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and enter the Campaign name created in the testcase VDBA-10
step.expectedresults: Campaign name with edit and details should show up

step.actions:
Modify the Campaign by 

  • Checking the Auto Pacing checkbox checked and enter the Pacing Overage percentage as 25
  • Change the geo location from CountryTargeting to City Targeting radio button and select the cities from the list available
  • Enter the Exchange/3rd party URL in the Excahnge settings section
step.expectedresults:
• Auto Pacing checkbox should be checked and entered percentage should be displayed
  • City Targeting Radio button should be selected and entered cities should 
  • Entered URL should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be saved and user should be on the details page of the Exchange Campaign and all the modifed values should be displayed

testcase.name: Create a Legacy Creative with new Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a Legacy creative with a new Endcard  and Verify

step.actions: Login to the application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the management page

step.actions: Navigtae to Advertiser option of the toggle and click on Campaigns tab
step.expectedresults: All the available Campaigns should be listed

step.actions: Now search the Campaign created in the testcase VDBA-8 and click on details icon in the table view
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page of the Campaign and "Add new Creative" link should be available on the right side.

step.actions: Click on Add new Creative
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the type of creative selection pop up window, after selecting Legacy Creative, user should be on the Creative setup page

step.actions:
Enter the following information on the Creative setup page,

  • Name
  • Check the Streaming creative check box checked
  • Note that "Select Campaigns to attach" radio button is selected and all the Campaigns under the Advertiser Application created in testcase VDBA-6 are listed.
  • In the Ad Payload section, select "Add New Video" radio button and enter the name of the Video
  • Click on the card setup link
  • Select Create new radio button
  • Enter the Endcard name and select the Template Type
  • Upload the portrait and landscape images from local folder
  • Upload Application icon
  • Enter the TPAT Event and URL  

    https://pixel.mtrcs.samba.tv/v2/vtr/vtrcertification/vtrcertification/vungle/impression?c={{{timestamp}}}&sa_deviceid={{{device_id}}}&sa_cr={{{creative}}}&sa_pl={{{vungle_id}}}&sa_li={{{eid}}}
step.expectedresults:
• Entered information should be dispalyed
  • "Select Campaigns to attach" radio button be default should be selected
  • Images should be uploaded

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults:
• Legacy Creative should be created and user should be on the details page with all the entered information displayed and also with Clone this Creative Link.
  • In the Video ad section on the details page, Video for preview should not be available as Video is not uploaded while creating the Creative.

testcase.name: Create a Legacy Creative without Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a Legacy Creative without Endcard and Verify

step.actions: Login to tha Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the management page

step.actions: Navigtae to Advertiser option of the toggle and click on Campaigns tab
step.expectedresults: All the available Campaigns should be listed .

step.actions: Now search the Campaign created in the testcase VDBA-8 and click on details icon in the table view
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Details page of the Campaign with "Add new Creative" link onthe right

step.actions: Click on Add new Creative
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the type of creative selection pop up window, after selecting Legacy Creative, user should be on the Creative setup page

step.actions:
Enter the following information on the Creative setup page,

  •  Name
  • Check the Streaming creative check box checked
  • Note that "Select Campaigns to attach" radio button is selected and all the Campaigns under the Advertiser Application created in testcase VDBA-6 are listed.
  • In the Ad Payload section, select "Add New Video" radio button and enter the name of the Video
  • Click on the card setup link
  • Check the "No Endcard Required" checkbox
  • Enter the TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be dispalyed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Legacy Creative should be createdand user should be on the details page of the Creative with s3 URL blank in the Endcard section.

testcase.name: Create a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard
testcase.summary: Create a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have an Endcard to choose.

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Mangement page

step.actions: Go to the Advertiser option of the Dashboard
Search the Campaign that was created in testcase VDBA-8 in the Campaigns list and click on details link
step.expectedresults: Campaign created should be available and user should be on the details page of the Campaign

step.actions: Click on Add new Creative link located to the right of the Campaign
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Creative setup page

step.actions:
Enter the following information

  • Name
  •  Check the Streaming creative check box checked
  • Note that "Select Campaigns to attach" radio button is selected and all the Campaigns under the Advertiser Application created in testcase VDBA-6 are listed.
  • In the Ad Payload section, select "Add New Video" radio button and enter the name of the Video
  • Click on the card setup link
  •  Select "Select from existing endcard" radio button
  • Enter the TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults:
• Entered information should be displayed
  • All the CAmpaigns in the App should be displayed
  • Existing Endcard names should be displayed for selection, once selected the all the related data should be filled

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Legacy Creative with existing Endcard should be created and user should be on the Creative details page.

testcase.name: Create a Legacy Creative with a new Video and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a Legacy Creative with a new Video and Verify

step.actions: Execute the steps 1 to 4 of testcase VDBA-14
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Creative setup page

step.actions:
Enter the following information on the Creative setup page

  • Name
  • Select one or more tags
  • In the Video setup section, select "Add new video" radio button
  • Enter the unique name of the video
  • Upload the video by clicking on "Select file to upload" and navigating to local folder and then click on Upload video
  • Chek the "Endcard not required" checkbox in the card setup section
  • Enter the TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed, uploaded video name should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Legacy Creative should be created and user should be on the details page with the preview of the video uploaded.

testcase.name: Create a Legacy Creative with an existing Video and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a Legacy Creative with existing Video and Verify

step.actions: Execute the steps 1 to 4 of testcase VDBA-14
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Creative setup page

step.actions:
Enter the following information on the Creative setup page,

  •     Name
  • Check the Streaming creative check box checked
  • Note that "Select Campaigns to attach" radio button is selected and all the Campaigns under the Advertiser Application created in testcase VDBA-6 are listed.
  • In the Ad Payload section, select "Choose from an existing video" radio button and select from the list.
  • Click on the card setup link
  •  Select Create new radio button
  • Enter the Endcard name and select the Template Type
  • Upload the portrait and landscape images from local folder
  • Upload Application icon
  • Enter the TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults:
• Entered information should be displayed
  • Selected Video should be displayed
  • New Endcard should be created

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Legacy Creative should be created

testcase.name: Update a Legacy creative with a new Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Update a Legacy creative with a new Endcard  and Verify

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search for the Creative created in test case VDBA-12
step.expectedresults: Creative should show up with details an dedit icons

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Update Creative page

step.actions: Change the Portrait and Landscape images in the endcard section
step.expectedresults: Modified image files and images should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Legacy creative with modified Endcard images should saved and user should be on the details page.

testcase.name: Modify a Legacy Creative without Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify Legacy Creative without Endcard and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have  a Legacy Creative without Endcard

step.actions: Login to th application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search the Legacy Creative created in testcase VDBA-13
step.expectedresults: Creative name should be displayed with details and edit icons .

step.actions: Add a new Endcard  or select from an existing endcards by unchecking the "Endcard not required" check box  by selecting the Appropriate radio buttons and click Submit
step.expectedresults: Now creative should be saved and it should have an Endcard

testcase.name: Modify a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with an exsiting Endcard

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to the Global search and search for the Legacy creative created in test case VDBA-14
step.expectedresults: Creative should be displayed

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be onthe Update Creative page

step.actions: Navigate to Endcard section, and select "Add new Endcard" and enter the data and upload the images for the new endcard and click Submit
step.expectedresults: Creative should be modified with new Endcard and user should be on the details page of the Creative.

testcase.name: Update a Legacy Creative with a new Video and Verify
testcase.summary: Update a Legacy Creative with a new Video and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with a new Video

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be onthe Mangaemnet Page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search the Creative created in test case VDBA-15
step.expectedresults: Creative should be available

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Update Creative page

step.actions:
• Remove Exchange Campaign from Attached Campaigns list
  • Add one more TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults:
• Exchange Campaign should be removed from the list of attached Campaigns
  • TPAT Event and URL should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Creative with modifications should be saved and displayed on the details page

testcase.name: Modify a Legacy Creative with an existing Video and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify a Legacy Creative with an existing Video and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with an existing Video

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search the cReative created in VDBA-16
step.expectedresults: Creative should be available with details and edit icons

step.actions: Click Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Update Creative page

step.actions: In the Video Setup section,  change the existing video file and click Submit
step.expectedresults: Creative should be created with updated video file

testcase.name: Clone a Legacy Creative with a new Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Legacy Creative with a new Endcard and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with a new Endcard

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management Page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search for the Legacy Creative created in VDBA-12 and click on details icon located next to it
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Legacy Creative details page

step.actions: Click on "Clone This Creative" Link on the Creative details Page
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Creative setup page with all pre existing information of the Creative created in VDBA-12 except Name

step.actions: Enter the name of the Clone Creative and click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone Creative with a new name and with a new Endcard as the original Creative should be created and user should be on the details page

testcase.name: Clone a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with an existing Endcard

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be onthe Management Page

step.actions: Navigate to the Global search and search for the Creative created in the testcase VDBA-14
step.expectedresults: Legacy Creative should be displayed with Details and edit icons.

step.actions: Click on "Clone This Creative" link
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Creative setup page with all the information of the Creative created in te testcase VDBA-14 except Name

step.actions: Enter the name of the clone Creative
step.expectedresults: Name should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone of the Legacy Creative should be created with new name and with the existing Endcard as in the Original Legacy Creative

testcase.name: Clone a Legacy Creative without Endcard and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Legacy Creative without Endcard and Verify

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management Page

step.actions: Navigate to Global Search and enter the Creative name created in the test case VDBA-18
step.expectedresults: Creative should be available with details and edit icons

step.actions: Click on details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the detials page of the Creative

step.actions: Click on "Clone This Creative" Link
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Creative setup page of the clone Creative with all the pre existing information except the Name of the Craetive

step.actions: Enter the Name of the Creative and Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone of the Creative without a Endcard should be created and user should be on the details page.

testcase.name: Clone a Legacy Creative with a new Video and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Legacy Creative with a new Video and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with a new Video

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search for the Creative created in test case VDBA-15
step.expectedresults: Creative should be available

step.actions: Click on details icon located next to the Creative name in the Global search result
step.expectedresults: User should be onthe Craetive setup page with all the preexisting information of the Creatiuve created in the testcase VDBA-15 except Name.

step.actions: Enter the Creative Name and click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone of the Creative with a new video should be created and user should be directed to the Detailspage of the Creative.

testcase.name: Clone a Legacy Creative with an existing Video and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Legacy Creative with an existing Video and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have a Legacy Creative with an existing Video

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to the Global Search and search for a Creative created in the testcase VDBA-16
step.expectedresults: Legacy Creative with existing Video should be available with details and edit  icons

step.actions: Click on Details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Creative details page with "Clone This Creative" link

step.actions: Click on "Clone This Creative" link
step.expectedresults: User shoule be directed to the Creative setup page with preexisting information of the Creative created in test case VDBA-16 except Name

step.actions: Enter the name of the Creative and Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone of the Original Creative in testcase VDBA-16 should be created with the new name given and user should be on the details page of te Creative with the preview of the Video

testcase.name: Create a Dynamic Template Creative and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a Dynamic Template Creative and Verify

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page.

step.actions: Navigate to Advertiser option of the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Accounts page with Campaigns, Applications and Creatives tab.

step.actions: Search the Campaign created in the testcase VDBA-8 in the Campaigns list table view
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be available

step.actions: Click on details icon of the Campaign
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page of the Campaign with "Add New Creative" Link to the right

step.actions: Click on "Add New Creative" and then Dynamic creative on the Creative selection pop up window
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Creative setup page

step.actions:
Enter the following information forthe Dynamic Template Creative

  • Name
  • Select the Dynamic Template as Carousel from the list Templates available
  • Check the streaming Creative checkbox
  • In the Video setup section, select the "Add new video" checkbox and enter the Video name
  • Upload the video 
  • Enter the Name, Company in the Product Description
  • Upload an App icon image
  • Enter the CTA URL
  • Upload three images for Carousel Image1/Image2/Image3 fields
  • Enter the TPAT Event and URL
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Dynamic Template Creative should be created and user should be on the detials page with the video preview

testcase.name: Clone a Dynamic Template Creative and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Dynamic Template Creative and Verify

step.actions: Login to the Application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Mangement page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search for the Dynamic Template Creative created in the test case VDBA-27
step.expectedresults: Dynamic Template cReative should be displayed

step.actions: Click on the details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page of the Creative

step.actions: Click on "Clone This Creative" link
step.expectedresults: User should land on the Creative setup page with the preexisting information of the Dynamic Template Creative created in test case VDBA-27 except name

step.actions: Enter the Name od the clone Creative and Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone of the Dynamic Template Creative should be created witha new name with all the information same as  the Creative in test case VDBA-27

testcase.name: Clone a Vungle Ads Campaign and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Vungle Ads Campaign and Verify

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: Usere should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search the Campaign cretaed in the test case VDBA-8
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be available

step.actions: Click on Details icon nxt to the Campaign
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page of the Campaign

step.actions: Click on "Clone The Campaign" Link
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Campaign page with all the existing information of the Campaign cretaed in VDBA-8 except the Name of the Campaign

step.actions: Enter the name of the Campaign and Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone Campaign should be created with a new name with exactly same information as the campaign in VDBA-8 testcase.

testcase.name: Clone a Exchange Campaign and Verify
testcase.summary: Clone a Exchange Campaign and Verify

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management Page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search the Campaign created in testcase VDBA-10
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be avilable with details and edit icons

step.actions: Click on Details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page of the Campaign with "Clone This Campaign" link

step.actions: Click on "Clone This Camoaign" link
step.expectedresults: user should be directed to the new Create Campaign page with all the preexisting information of the Campaign in test case VDBA-10 except name

step.actions: Enter the Name and click Submit
step.expectedresults: Clone of the Exchange  campaign should be created  with all the information same as Exchange Campaign of test case VDBA-10.

testcase.name: Modify a Cloned Legacy Creative and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify a Cloned Legacy Creative and Verify

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Mangement page

step.actions: Navigate to the Global search and search the Cloned Legacy Creative created in test caseVDBA-22
step.expectedresults: Creative should be available

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Update Creative Page

step.actions: Goto Endcard section and change the images for Potrait and Landscape
step.expectedresults: Change image files should appear along with the images

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page with modified information

testcase.name: Modify a Cloned Dynamic Creative and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify a Cloned Dynamic Creative and Verify

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and enter the Creative name created in the test case VDBA-27
step.expectedresults: Dynamic Template Creative should be available

step.actions: Click on Edit button
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Update Creative page

step.actions: Now change the template from Carousel to Gradient  inthe Dynamic Template drop down field
step.expectedresults: Template should be changed and the Carousel template fields should disappear and all the Gradient template fields should be displayed

step.actions: Enter the Gradient Template Information for Product Description like App name, Company name, CTA URL, Landscape and Portrait Images
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: User should land on details page of the Creative with modified information

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Vungle ads Campaign should be created and user should be on the details page with TPAT field blank.

testcase.name: Verify the Default Placement of the Publisher App
testcase.summary: Verify the Default Placement of the Publisher App

step.actions: Execute the test case VDBA-1
step.expectedresults: Amazon Publisher App should be created and a Default Placement should be created and dispalyed onthe right side of the details page of the App withe name Default and Add new Placement link

step.actions: Click on Default Placement
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Placemnt page with Placment Status, Placement details and Advanced settings

testcase.name: Create a new Placement a for Amazon App and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a new Placement a for Amazon App and Verify
testcase.preconditions: Should have an Amazon Publisher App

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Mangement page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and search the Amazon App created in testcase VDBA-1
step.expectedresults: App should be available

step.actions: Click on Details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details pag eof the Amazon App

step.actions: Click on "Add New Placemnt" link located right of the Amazon App details page
step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Create Placement page

step.actions:
Enter the following information on Placement Page

  • Name
  • Target CP Floor
  • Check the Rewarded check box
  • Select the supported Template Types
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be displayed

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Placement should be created and user be directed to the table view of the placement with Status, Placement name, Reference ID, View, Revenue, Auto Cached and Target CPM Floor information.

testcase.name: Modify a Placement and Verify
testcase.summary: Modify a Placement and Verify

step.actions: Lgon to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Mangement page

step.actions: Navigate to Global search and enter the Reference ID of the placement created in test case VDBA-38
step.expectedresults: Placement should be available

step.actions: Click on edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Edit Placement page

step.actions: Change the Target CPM Floor Value and click Submit
step.expectedresults: New entered value of the CPM Floor should be displayed and user should be on the table view of the placement with the new Target CPM Floor value.

step.expectedresults: User should be directed to the Table view of all available Deals

step.expectedresults: User should land on Create Deal page

Enter the following information:

  • Seat IDs

• Entered information should be displayed

testcase.name: Create a Template with a Amazon App and Verify
testcase.summary: Create a Template with a Amazon App for Publisher Whitelist and Verify

step.actions: Login to Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Click on Hamburger icon
step.expectedresults: Dashboatd menu should be displayed

step.actions: Click on Templates
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Templates page, with all the available Templates and a New Template button

step.actions: Click on "New Template"
step.expectedresults: User should land on Create Template page

step.actions:
Entre the following information

  • Select the Template Type from the drop down list
  • Enter the name
  • For Publisher Whitelist, search for the Amazon App created in test case VDBA-1 and select
  • Upload a template zip file
  • https://cdn-lb.vungle.com/templates/57f812d93e4d63c13c000038-v0/CloudUX-Carousel-v.1.3.4.zip
step.expectedresults: File should be uploaded and all the replacements should be displayed.

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Template should be created and user should be on the table view of the Templates

step.actions: Login to Dashboard

step.expectedresults: All the dashboard menu should be displayed

step.actions: Click on Reports
step.expectedresults: User should land on the Reports Page

step.actions: On Reports page, click on Specific Application and select the Amazon App by scrolling down or search the Application name
step.expectedresults: Amazon App should be displayed

step.actions: Click on Download Report
step.expectedresults: Report should be downloaded and the information related to the Amazon App selected should be displayed

testcase.name: Verify Amazon App is added to Reports Content

testcase.preconditions: Report should contain Amazon Publisher Apps.

step.actions: Login to the application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Click on Hamburger icon and navigtae to Reports tab
step.expectedresults: Dashboard menu should be displayed and user should be directed to the Reports page

step.actions: On the Reports page, select the Timeframe and clickon Download Report
step.expectedresults:
Report should be downloaded.

The report should have the Amazon Pub Apps listed that was added  during the time frame given.

Report should have Amazon OS.

testsuite.name: Amazon End to End Testing
testsuite.details: Amazon end to End testing to verify the adds are playing on Amazon Fire

testcase.name: Create Amazon Publisher Application
testcase.summary: Amazon publisher Application should be created.

step.actions: Login to Dashboard as Admin user
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Mangement Page

step.actions: Click on "Add New Application" button
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Application page

step.actions:
On the Create Application page, enter the following information

  • Select the Amazon Platform radio button
  • Enter the nam eo fthe Application
  • Check the box "My app is live on the app store"
  • Enter the Amazon url
  • Enter the required information
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be saved in the appropriate fields

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Publisher Application should be created and user should be on the details page

step.actions: Verify the Default palcement is created
step.expectedresults: Default Placement should be created

testcase.name: Create Amazon Advertiser Application
testcase.summary: Create an Advertiser application

step.actions: Login to the Dashboard
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Management page

step.actions: Click on Hamburger icon and toggle to the Advertiser option
step.expectedresults: User should beon the Advertiser side of the application

step.actions: Click on "Applications" tab and then "Add New Application" button
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Advertiser Application page

step.actions: Enter the required information and click submit
step.expectedresults: Advertiser Application should be created and user should lane on details page

testcase.name: Whitelist the Applications
testcase.summary: Whitelist the Advertiser Application
testcase.preconditions: Advertiser and Publisher should be available

step.actions: Navigate to Global serach and searcjh for the Publisher Application created in test case VDBA-49
step.expectedresults: Application should be available

step.actions: Click on Edit icon
step.expectedresults: User should be onthe update page

step.actions: In the targer application field, search and select the Advertiser application created in VDBA-50 and select whitelist radio button
step.expectedresults: Advertiser application should be whitelisted

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Publisher Application should be saved oand on the details page, amazon advertiser application should be displayed as whitelisted

step.actions: Click onthe Advertiser Application
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Advertiser Application details page

step.actions: Click Edit and in the target application field search the Publisher Application created in VDBA-49 and whitelist
step.expectedresults: Application should be available and should be whitelisted

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Advertiser Application should be saved with Amaxzon Publisher Application whitelisted

testcase.name: Create a Campaign
testcase.summary: Create a Campaign

step.actions: Navigate to Advertiser Application created in test case VDBA-50 and click on "add new campaign" on the right
step.expectedresults: User should be on the cReate Campaign page

step.actions: Enter the name of the Campaign and search and select the Advertiser Application created in test case VDBA-50
step.expectedresults: Application should be available

step.actions: Enter the total Amount and the other required information
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be saved in the appropriate fields

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be created and user should land on the details page

testcase.name: Create a Dynamic Template Creative
testcase.summary: Create a Dynamic Template creative for Gradient tempalte

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and navigate to Global searc and search fo rthe Campaign created in the test case VDBA-52
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be available

step.actions: From the details page of the Campaign, click on "add new creative" link onthe right
step.expectedresults: User should be on the cReate Craetive Page

step.actions:
On the Create Creative page, enter the

  • Name of the Creative
  • Select the Gradient Dynamic Template 
  • Enter the required information
  • Select the Campaign to attach
  • In the Video section,select add new video radio button and upload a video
  • In the card section, check the box for Endcard not required
step.expectedresults:
Entered information should be saved

Video should be uploaded and ready for preview

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Dynamic CReative should be created

testcase.name: Create a legacy Creative
testcase.summary: Create a Legacy Creative

step.actions: Login to Dashboard ans search the Campaign created in VDBA-52 from the Global search
step.expectedresults: Campaign should be available

step.actions: Click on Details icon
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Campaign Details page

step.actions: From the Campaign details page, cklick on "Add New Creative" and then select Legacy Creative in the pop up window
step.expectedresults: User should land on the create Creative page

step.actions:
On the cReate Creative page, Enter the following

  • Name
  • In the Video section, select the add new video radio button
  • Enter the name of the Video and upload the Video
  • In the card section, check the Endcard required check box
  • Select the Campaign 
  • Enter the TPAT URL
step.expectedresults: Enetered information should be saved

step.actions: Click Submit
step.expectedresults: Creative should be created and user should be directed to the Creative details page with the video preview.

testcase.name: Configure the system to play the ad
testcase.summary: Configure the Amazon fire to play the add
testcase.preconditions: Amazon device should be ready with the test app

step.actions: On the Amazon Fire device, set up the configurations by entering the laptop IP address and port no in the settings
step.expectedresults: IP Address and port no should be updated

step.actions: Makesure Laptop and Amazon device both are on the same Wifi.
step.expectedresults: Bothe the devies should be on the same Wifi

step.actions: Navigate to chls.pro to download the certificate
step.expectedresults: Certificate should be downloaded

step.actions: Clear the cache/existing data on the Amazon device by going Applications/Application manager
step.expectedresults: Existing data should be removed

testcase.name: Play the Ad
testcase.summary: Play the add on the Amazon device

step.actions:
On the Amazon Fire, 

  • Install the App on amazon device and set charles Proxy.
  • Enter the Application ID
  • Enter the Placement ID's
  • Initialize the SDK.
  • Observe the charles.
step.expectedresults:
•  App should get initialized.
  • Config API should get called.
  • SDK should download an Ad for the placement id when auto cache flag is enabled.

step.actions: Click Play
step.expectedresults: Amazon  placement ID should serve the Ad and Ad should play normally on TestApp with respect to the amazon placement id.

testcase.name: Create a Manual Placement
testcase.summary: Create a placement manually

step.actions: Login to Dashboard and search the Publisher Application creaed in test case VDBA-49
step.expectedresults: User should be on the details page

step.actions: Click on Add new Placemet on the right side
step.expectedresults: User should be on the Create Placement Page

step.actions:
Enter the required information

  • Name of the Placement
  • Check th erewarded check box
  • Enter the Target CPM Floor
  • Note, in the Supported Ad formats field, Vungle Local, Vungle Mraid and third party displayed
step.expectedresults: Entered information should be saved

step.actions: click Submit
step.expectedresults: Placement should be created with a unique reference ID .
